Wisdom: إِذَا كَرُمَ [أُكْرِمَ‏] أَصْلُ الرَّجُلِ كَرُمَ مَغِيبُهُ وَمَحْضَرُهُ
enWisdom: When the core of a man is noble, [both] his absence and presence are [considered] noble

Wisdom: جَمِيلُ الْمَقْصَدِ يَدُلُّ عَلَى طَهَارَةِ الْمَوْلِدِ
enWisdom: Having good aims [and intentions] is an indication of legitimate birth
The pride of a man is by his merit, not because of his origin [and lineage]

Wisdom: لَيْسَتِ الْأَنْسَابُ بِالْآبَاءِ وَالْأُمَّهَاتِ لَكِنَّهَا بِالْفَضَائِلِ الْمَحْمُودَاتِ
enWisdom: Lineage is not defined by the fathers and mothers, rather [it is defined] by the praiseworthy merits

Wisdom: مَنْ أَخَّرَهُ عَدَمُ أَدَبِهِ لَمْ يُقَدِّمْهُ كَثَافَةُ حَسَبِهِ
enWisdom: One who is held back by his lack of etiquette will not be pushed forward by the weight of his honourable lineage

Wisdom: مَنْ أَبْطَأَ بِهِ عَمَلُهُ لَمْ يُسْرِعْ بِهِ نَسَبُهُ
enWisdom: One who is slowed down by his action cannot be quickened by his lineage

Wisdom: مَنْ وَضَعَهُ دَنَاءَةُ أَدَبِهِ لَمْ يَرْفَعْهُ شَرَفُ حَسَبِهِ
enWisdom: One who is abased because of his poor etiquette will not be elevated by his noble lineage
ne whose lineage is wicked, his presence [in any gathering] is bad
One whose lineage is honourable, his presence is good

Wisdom: مَنْزَعُ [مَفْزَعُ‏] الْكَرِيمِ أَبَداً إِلَى شِيَمِ آبَائِهِ
enWisdom: The propensity of a noble-minded person is always towards the [positive] traits of his forefathers
There is no beauty like high regard
Physical beauty is of no benefit without nobility
